Makers, Designers and Kickstarters

Create new physical objects for your home and connect them to the web in no time

Everything communicates

Connect your device to the web using Lelylan and make it accessible through a rich set of API. Your products become part of a bigger platform where devices communicate with each other and where any service like IFTTT, Twitter and Glasses can be integrated.

Physicals API →

Any hardware

Use the hardware you are most familiar with. Arduino, Electric imp, Raspberry Pi, Nanode, Flyport and basically any other hardware giving you web connectivity is a perfect solution.

Simple and fast integration

Integrating Lelylan to any physical device requires you to implement just two services. We put big effort on making this process as simple as possible to let you focus only on the product and design definition.

Physicals API →

A structured solution

Device must be clearly defined. Once the device properties and functionalities are defined we can extend the connected home capabilities. For this reason we created Lelylan Types where you can search or create new device.

Help us defining the connected home structure →

Sell your products

You are a startup and you want to sell a new smart device? We give you a dashboard to create and monitor all your devices, together with a secure activation system that lets your customers become the new owners of your devices.

Infinite apps

Everyone can build new solutions using Lelylan and you automatically get them. A Google Glass app let Lelylan control any device? An HTML5 app works on any mobile device? As soon as new solutions pop up, you can use them to access your devices.

Developers →

Kickstarter ready

Lelylan supports any hardware based project, big and small, that is brought to life through the ideas of people like you. Use Lelylan to add new features and to speed up the development cycle of your product. We will give you full support.

Interested in building hardware using Lelylan?
